title: Thyroid, Adrenal Glands, and Hormones w/ Dr. Shannyn
itunes:title: Thyroid, Adrenal Glands, and Hormones w/ Dr. Shannyn
description: I’ve been going through my own hormone health journey since January 2022 and have been working with Dr. Shannyn. I’m so excited to have her on today’s episode of the podcast as she shares her wisdom and knowledge on how to heal our hormones, the steps we can take right now, and why individual testing is so crucial for true healing. For all of the show notes and links, visit https://melissaknorris.com/348.
